body: Should there be a time machine in the next version of minecraft
body_tagged: Should there be a time machine in the next version of minecraft
title: time mechine in the next version of minecraft

replies.body: I don't think so, it's already been done in modded Minecraft. But all in all there are some things that should stay in modded and that should be one of them.
replies.body_tagged: I don't think so, it's already been done in modded Minecraft. But all in all there are some things that should stay in modded and that should be one of them.

replies.body: Please don't make so many posts. If you wanna talk about different things please try to keep it in one post
